--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Havotron turned to Spinister.  He thought for a moment. "Spinister, 
> contact SLugslinger and Needlenose, have them attach wires from our 
> ship to the Autobot ship. The cut the engine. No matter where they 
go 
> we will follow.  Nightmare, get all injured and in stasis lock into 
> safe compartments. We will need them. Quake, you help Nightmare.
> 
> Quake turned and looked at Havotron then Nightmare and spit a drip 
of 
> oil in disgust.
> 
> "NOW!!!" Havotron ordered.
> 


::LONG HAUL::

    Long Haul, who was none too steady on his feet, looked at the 
others around him. He seemed to ponder his actions for a momment, then 
halfheartedly saluted to Havotron.
    "Since I've been sitting on my keester until now." he said dryly, 
"what would you have me do." In truth he was both frightened and 
curious as heck. He figured it best to hide his TRUE emotions as he 
didn't want to stirr up any teasing from his comrads. Plus the 
sudden...chain of events...had peeked his interest.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
